summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Paul Morris Stepania providing an update on asset transfers related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial. It discusses the status of medallion stamping and FedEx shipping of documents, as well as instructions to hold off on certain transactions until confirmation of asset movement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is providing an update on asset transfers and related tasks in her role at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Paul Morris Stepania
persons.context: Paul Morris Stepania is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby regarding the asset transfer updates.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having requested to hold off on certain financial transactions until confirmation is received.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is providing updates to Paul Morris Stepania in a professional context.
Harry is in a position to give instructions to Amanda Kirby regarding financial transactions.

keyFacts: The email discusses the transfer of assets related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial.
Documents are being medallion stamped and will be sent via FedEx to JPM.
Amanda Kirby is instructed to hold off on sending Southern Financial until asset confirmation.
